item.title: Scraping Whiskey Reviews Using Scrapy
item.description: Background This is a working document to help understand the first stage of this project - the data grab. It is also a helpful learning tool for myself, as this is the first real spider that I’ve created to pull data from a website. Setup The initial setup is quick, simply cd into the directory that you want to work in and run - scrapy startproject whiskey_reviews Easy enough.
